DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of maintenance BCG immunotherapy (dose 27 mg) in superficial bladder tumors. Two randomized arms (every 3 or 6 months) will be studied for a population of 300 patients.
DOC.detailed_description: BCG maintenance immunotherapy 1/3 dose : 27 mg two randomized arms : 3 or 6 months for 36 months clinical side effects according to OMS score efficacy regarding recurrence : cytology and cystoscopy PSA, leucocyturia and N-ramp gene evaluation
DOC.criteria: Ta and T1 bladder tumors BCG contraindications
